--select data froma  file
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



--select all data from a folder with use of wild card *
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--select data from subfolders, use of **
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--select data from couple of folders
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



--select data from all folders and all files
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



--file metadata function filename()
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



--count records in each folder
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    count(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename();


--filepath function filepath()
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    count(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath()
ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath();


--select using a where clause filepath() based on wildcard number
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    count(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND result.filepath(2) IN ('04', '05', '06')

GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);
